src:
REZZIME DANA (nedelja): Neponovljivi het-trik za tri minuta u Brazilu vas obradovao, Italijani pokvarili dan
Pogledajte ko vam je 3. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

03 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO

ANDERLEHT - SERKL BRIŽ (tip 1, kvota 1,35) - rezultat 2:1Mnogo je bolje nego što je bilo na startu sezone sa Vensanom Kompanijem i Sajmonom Dejvisom, ali daleko od toga da je ovo Anderleht na koji su navijači navikli. Slavni Kraljevski klub slavio je protiv najgoreg tima lige - Serkl Briža (2:1), međutim pitanje je kako bi se taj meč završio da VAR nije pomogao domaćinu. Utisak je, u 70. minutu glavni arbitar Laforž komotno je mogao i da prizna gol gostiju za 2:2, ali on je odlučio da ga posle dugog gledanja snimaka - poništi. Navodno, golman Anderlehta došao je do lopte pre strelca Lajla Fostera, te je pogodak postigao uz prekršaj nad čuvarom mreže. Sumnja je, ipak, ostala. IZVEŠTAJ.
KOPENHAGEN - SONDERJILAND (tip 1, kvota 1,42) - rezultat 3:0Sreća u Danskoj, gde je Kopenhagen prema očekivanjima lagano savladao Sonderjiland. Doduše, za to su mu bili neophodni pogoci iz dva penala, te pogodak Sotirija u 86. minutu koji je postavio konačan rezultat na ovom meču. Samim tim, vi ste mogli da zaokružite lepog keca i da se okrenete ostalim utakmicama.
FLAMENGO - KORINTIJANS (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 4:1Kakva laganizza u Brazilu! Enrike vas je obradovao sa tri gola u tri minuta. Apsolutno neponovljiv het-trik desio se na prelomu dva poluvremena. Brazilac je prvo postigao gol u prvom, pa u drugom minutu nadoknade vremena prvog dela igre, a potom dokrajčio rivala još jednim pogotkom u 46. minutu. Vitinjo je do kraja postigao još jedan gol za domaćina, dok je Vital imao tu čast da da samo utešni gol za gosta.
FCSB - SEPSI (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 2:1Iz dvojke u keca, ali ne na vašu štetu, već na vašu korist. Dosta ste morali da se oznojite u Rumuniji ne bi li ste zaokružili keca. Tipovali ste na posrnuli FCSB, nadali ste se da će dobiti Sepsi, a to se desilo, doduše uz dosta muke. Gost je poveo golom Karanovića u 27. minutu utakmice, ali je FCSB prvo preko Gnohera poravnao, a potom i golom Tanasea poveo i postavio konačan rezultat na ovoj utakmici.
PORTO - AVES (tip 1, kvota 1,10) - rezultat 1:0Jedan, ali vredan gol Porta. Nije portugalski velikan blistao danas protiv Avesa, promašio je veliki broj šansi, ali je zahvaljujući pogotku Markana još iz 13. minuta igre uspeo da pokupi sva tri boda. Ruku na srce, imao je i Aves svoje šanse, ali večeras nije bio dovoljno precizan da dođe bar do jednog osvojenog boda.

PRECRTANO

ATALANTA - KALJARI (tip 1, kvota 1,33) - rezultat 0:2Hit jeseni u Seriji A je Kaljari! Dobar je to tim, dobro je i vođen, a još bolje igra. Posle nove pobede, velike pobede u gostima nad Atalantom (2:0), umešao se među najbolje u vrhu tabele. Tamo gde se dele ulaznice za Ligu šampiona. IZVEŠTAJ.
FJORENTINA - PARMA (tip 1, kvota 1,55) - rezultat 1:1Uspela je Fjorentina da izbegne poraz protiv Parme u zanimljivom okršaju odigranom na stadionu Artemio Franki - 1:1. Oba trenera bila su lišena usluga nekoliko zapaženih prvotimaca, kod domaćih nije bilo Riberija, Kaseresa i Pecele, na drugoj strani su nedostajali Ingleze, Bruno Alves i Grasi, pa je i fudbal bio nešto siromašniji. IZVEŠTAJ.
BAZEL - KSAMAKS (tip 1, kvota 1,27) - rezultat 1:1Užasno vreme definitivno je imalo uticaj na ishod utakmice između Bazela i Ksamaksa. Domaćin nije uspeo da dođe do pobede, iako se to očekivalo, pa ste razočarano mogli da ispratite tikete u kantu. Da neće sve ići kako treba, videlo se sredinom prvog poluvremena kada su gosti došli u vodstvo. Uspeo je Bazel da vrati jedan gol nazad, ali ne i dva, što je vama bilo neophodno.
PAOK - PANATINAIKOS (tip 1, kvota 1,35) - rezultat 2:2Kiks na jugu Balkana! Kec nije bio ni blizu u velikom derbiju grčkog šampionata, iako rezultat možda sugeriše da je bilo drugačije... PAOK je došao do vrednog boda golom u 101. minutu utakmice i to sa bele tačke. Prethodno je gubio od 44. minuta golom Zahida, potom poravnao na 1:1 pogotkom Vijerinje, ali je Maheda u 87. minutu ponovo doveo goste u prednost. Šteta za tikete.
BRAGA - FAMILIKAO (tip 1, kvota 1,38) - rezultat 2:2Drama sa nesrećnim krajem na meču između Brage i Familikaa. Najveće iznenađenje dosadašnjeg toka portugalskog šampionata bilo je na pragu još jedne senzacije, što vama naravno nije išlo na ruku, delovalo je da je Braga ipak uspela da preokrene rezultat na svoju vodenicu, ali je usledio hladan tuš u 89. minutu. Gost je uspeo da povede sa igračem manje preko Tonija Martineza, ali je Galeno sa dva gola u svega dva minuta preokrenuo rezultat. To nije bio kraj, Anderson je u 89. minutu poravnao rezultat i doneo bod Familikau.
text:
DAILY SUMMARY (Sunday): Unique three-minute hat trick in Brazil makes you happy, Italians spoil the day
Take a look at who brought you the money on November 3 and who sold you ...

03 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED

ANDERLEHT - SERKL BRIZ (tip 1, odds 1,35) - 2: 1 result Much better than it was at the start of the season with Vancean Company and Simon Davis, but far from being the Anderlecht fans are used to. The famous Royal Club celebrated against the worst team in the league - Cercle Brugge (2: 1), but the question is how this match would end if VAR did not help the host. The impression was, in the 70th minute, Chief Arbitrator Laforge could comfortably concede the visitors' goal for 2: 2, but he decided to cancel it after a long look at the shots. Reportedly, the Anderlecht goalkeeper came to the ball before goalkeeper Lyle Foster and scored with a foul over the keeper. The doubt, however, remained. REPORT.
COPENHAGEN - SONDERJILAND (type 1, odds 1,42) - result 3: 0Happiness in Denmark, where Copenhagen is expected to easily defeat Sonderjiland. Admittedly, he needed two-penalty shots and a Sotiri goal in the 86th minute that set the final score for this match. Therefore, you could have rounded up a nice ace and turned to other games.
FLAMENGO - CORINTIANCE (tip 1, odds 1,50) - result 4: 1What a light pizza in Brazil! Enrique cheered you up with three goals in three minutes. An absolutely unbelievable hat-trick happened at the break of two halves. The Brazilian first scored in the first, then in the second minute of the time off the first part of the game, and then finished the rival with another goal in the 46th minute. Vitinho scored another goal for the home side, while Vital had the honor of giving only a consolation goal to the guest.
FCSB - SEPSI (Type 1, odds 1.50) - Score 2: 1From two in ace, but not to your detriment but to your advantage. You had to sweat a lot in Romania to get around the ace. You typed on the stumbling FCSB, you hoped it would get Sepsi, and it happened, though with a lot of trouble. The guest led with a goal from Karanovic in the 27th minute of the game, but FCSB first scored through Gnoher and then scored with Tanase's goal and set the final score in this game.
PORTO - AVES (Type 1, Odds 1.10) - Result 1: 0One but worth a goal for Porto. The Portuguese great did not shine against Aves today, he missed a lot of chances, but thanks to Markan's goal from the 13th minute of the game he managed to collect all three points. Hand to heart, Aves had his chances too, but tonight he wasn't accurate enough to get at least one point.

PRECRTANO

ATALANTA - CAGLIARS (type 1, odds 1,33) - Score 0: 2Hit fall in Serie A is Cagliari! He's a good team, he's well-run and he plays better. After a new win, a big away win over Atalanta (2-0), he was among the best in the top spot. Where the Champions League tickets are distributed. REPORT.
FJORENTINA - PARMA (type 1, odds 1.55) - 1: 1 Fiorentina managed to avoid defeat against Parma in an interesting match played at Artemio Franki Stadium - 1: 1. Both coaches were deprived of the services of a few notable first team players, the home team lacked Ribery, Caceres and Pecella, on the other hand lacked Ingleze, Bruno Alves and Grasi, so the football was a bit poorer. REPORT.
Basel - KSAMAX (type 1, odds 1.27) - result 1: 1Third weather definitely had an impact on the outcome of the match between Basel and Xamax. The host did not manage to win, although this was expected, so you could disappointly send the tickets to the bin. That everything was not going to go right was seen in the middle of the first half when the guests came into the lead. Basel managed to get one goal back but not two, which you needed.
PAOK - PANATINAIKOS (tip 1, odds 1,35) - result 2: 2Kix in the south of the Balkans! Ace was nowhere near the big derby of the Greek Championship, although the result may suggest that it was different ... PAOK came up with a valuable goal in the 101st minute of the game, from a white spot. Previously, he had lost Zahid's goal in the 44th minute, then leveled to 1: 1 with a goal from Vyrewina, but Maheda again put the guests ahead in the 87th minute. Too bad for the tickets.
BRAGA - FAMILIKAO (type 1, odds 1,38) - Score 2: 2Drama with an unfortunate end in the match between Braga and Familika. The biggest surprise of the course of the Portuguese Championship so far was on the threshold of another sensation, which of course did not work for you, it seemed that Braga still managed to turn the score on its mill, but followed by a cold shower in the 89th minute. The guest managed to take the lead with less through Tony Martinez, but Galeno scored two goals in just two minutes. That was not the end, Anderson evened the score in the 89th minute and scored a Familikau score.
